source: U.S. Department of Transportation Highway Safety Funds (23 U.S.C. § 402)
statutory_basis:
Section 33 of the Administrative Office of the Courts appropriation for a prior fiscal year (SB70) contains special
language authorizing federal highway safety incentive funds received under 23 U.S.C. § 402 by the Arkansas State Police
to be granted to the Administrative Office of the Courts and deposited into the State Central Services Fund to
reimburse expenditures for the continuing education program for district judges【422389437869558†L502-L509】.  The
statute does not state a specific amount for this reimbursement.
